CustomField.description: Enter a number representing the maximum total hours that must be attached to the Timesheet when submitting for approval - Total Hours field. This would be enforced only when the user submits for approval from the My Timesheet - if the hours are greater than Max Total Hours - produce an error message
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a number representing the maximum total hours that must be attached to the Timesheet when submitting for approval - Total Hours field.
CustomField.label: Max Total Hours
